prompts: Create a playful lion-like Pokemon with fluffy fur and a fiery mane.
I want a small, energetic fire-type Pokemon that resembles a baby lion.
Generate a cute Pokemon with brown fur and a bright red tuft on its head.
Make a fire-type Pokemon that has large, expressive eyes and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a young lion, full of energy.
Design a Pokemon with a soft, cuddly appearance and a fierce fire-type ability.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a warm, friendly personality.
